title: Лихач
overview: Sergey Sotnikov is one of the most prominent employees of the criminal investigation department of Sochi, dissecting the city and the surrounding area on his motorcycle. For his love of fast and extreme driving, he received the nickname Reckless Driver. Stubborn, fair and self-confident Sotnikov has managed to achieve a lot in the fight against crime over the years. He could have become a big boss in the criminal investigation department for a long time, but work in the office is not for him. Murders, robberies, and assaults happen every now and then in the city, but no crime remains without the attention of a Reckless Driver. Sochi can sleep peacefully — this city has its own hero, reckless and uncompromising!
